title: Chocolate Rum Truffles
ingredients: ['200g light sponge cake, finely diced', '4 tablespoons dark rum (54% alcohol)', '125ml orange juice', '60g butter', '30g icing sugar', '4 drops rum essence', '100g dark chocolate, finely chopped', '100g white chocolate, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons oil', 'To Decorate', '100g grated chocolate or chocolate strands', '75g desiccated coconut']
